FuncDef:
The authentication-scheme command configures an authentication scheme for the current service policy scheme.
The undo authentication-scheme command cancels authentication scheme for the current service policy scheme currently configured.
By default, the service policy scheme for the current service policy is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an authorization scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command configures an authentication scheme for the current service policy scheme when the authentication is necessary to the service. the authentication will be processed according to the authentication scheme.
Prerequisites
The authentication scheme has been configured.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
Currently, the EDSG service only supports no-authentication and RADIUS authentication.
